item.description:
Meet us at the Bistro at 7:30 P.M. located inside the Radisson Hotel in Hyannis for chit-chat before the show, and to welcome new members. The Bistro serves drinks, appetizers and/or brick oven gourmet pizzas.

After the Bistro, we'll head into the The Comedy Lounge. The doors open at 8:30 P.M.

The Show Starts at 9:00 P.M. Featuring FRANK SANTORELLI .. From The Sopranos ... Late Night with Conan O'Brien!


Tickets are $12.00 on line (special price for November)

Each Lady is Responsible for Purchasing their Own Tickets On Line!!!

GO TO: http://www.comedyloun...
Select BUY TICKETS
Make Sure You Choose: Saturday, Nov 15th 9:00pm

Tickets At The Door Cost $15.00!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the Pink Hat that says, "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!"

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Lite Bites at the Bistro with Comedy Show to Follow at the Radisson Hotel
